task_description: Facing the building to your North-West (approx. 315°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To see the full structure of the target building (from ground to roof), I need to look upward since the current pitch is 0° and only the lower part is visible. I will rotate the camera up to pitch 30° while maintaining the current heading.

I am facing the target building, but the 0° pitch only shows the lower part; I need to look up to view the roof, so I will rotate the camera upward to pitch 30° while maintaining the 315° heading to capture the full structure for height estimation.

To avoid repeated heading resets, I will perform a custom rotation to set heading directly to 315°NW and pitch to 30°UP in one step, aligning with the target building and looking up to view its full structure.
